author: Kim Myers
title: Robert Lambert Joins Allegis Partners as Managing Director in Human Resources Practice
text:
Allegis Partners (AP), a global executive search firm, announced today the addition of Robert “Bob” Lambert as a Managing Director in the Human Resources Practice in its Orange County office. Bob’s career as a Human Resources operating executive with PepsiCo, The Stride Rite Corporation and Broadway Stores, coupled with his 18 years of experience in retained executive search, position him as a trusted advisor to his clients. He has led hundreds of leadership engagements in multiple industries with a wide spectrum of clients. His reputation for contributing and enhancing clients’ talent strategies, while building stronger organizational capability and senior leadership teams is second to none in the industry.
“Long recognized as one of the most effective consultants in the executive search industry, Bob integrates his corporate operating experience with knowledge of the talent objectives of his clients to become a trusted advisor to CEOs, boards, CHROs and executive management teams,” said Mike Bergen, Managing Partner and Global HR Practice Leader with Allegis Partners.
Bob Lambert, commenting on his appointment, said, “Throughout my career, I have been dedicated to serving companies and clients of all sizes address critical strategic and organizational talent challenges. Allegis Partners represents a highly effective platform and opportunity for achieving this goal. The executive search industry is crowded, offering clients very little real differentiation. Allegis Partners takes a holistic approach as a talent consultancy, with access to a broad network of global candidates and solutions. This is the future, and I am thrilled to be a part of it.”
Prior to joining Allegis Partners, Bob was a Senior Client Partner at Morgan Samuels. Previously, he led his own consultancy and also spent many years in various management roles at executive search firms, including CTPartners and Heidrick & Struggles. He served as an officer in the U.S. Navy and holds a master’s degree from Webster University and a B.S. from Arizona State University.
Bob can be reached at rlambert(at)allegis-partners.com or (949)-280-8800.
About Allegis Partners
Allegis Partners is an executive search firm that provides professional services across a wide selection of corporate functions and industries, including Human Resources, Technology, Financial Services, Insurance and Board Search. Allegis Partners goes to the global market with a specialized approach matching deep skill, knowledge and capability, supported by the resources and personnel of its parent company, Allegis Group, one of the top-rated global human capital organizations.
